column4: ALL:: Hey, im having trouble booting from the ubuntu feisty cd. I see the ubuntu logo come up, so i go to start or install ubuntu. Then a screen comes up with a line of white text, then the screen goes black. about 1 min and a half later, a BIG whit flashing underscore comes up, then some BIG stretched text comes up (horizantally stretched.) after it says some stuff the screen blacks out (no backlight) then comes back up black(with backlight). then the cd driv
i thought u were going to help me...
